General.Name: Fujian Star Net Communic Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Star-net Communication Co., Ltd. provides information solutions for enterprise customers in China. It offers network, cloud, communication, finance, entertainment, communities, and other solutions. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Wanli  Liu
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board

3.Name: Mr. Wei Hong  Zheng
3.Title: Dean of Network Research Institute & Director

4.Title: Head of Purchasing Department, Assistant to the Gen. Mang. and Member of The Supervisory Board
